ing: 2 apples - peeled, cored and finely diced
des: "I love cabbage and always try to come up with new ideas for cooking with it; it's a very economical staple in the fall and winter months, thus this recipe. Add any vegetables or meats that you like, this a recipe of great versatility!  Serve with garlic bread topped with Italian seasoning.  Enjoy!"
ins:
In a large heavy pot, cook onion and apple in oil over medium-high heat until lightly browned.  Stir in cabbage and garlic, then reduce heat.  Stir in potato, broth, Italian seasoning and sugar; cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Stir in cream, salt and pepper.  Heat through and serve.
